Mr. President,
 
 At this early writing it appears as though you've secured another four years. May I say the billions upon billions of dollars you spent on programs designed to help you secure votes from so-called moderates did not provide you with so much as one single vote. You were elected on 2000 and again in 2004 by conservatives to practice fiscal responsibility. Please do so.
 
 Thank you.
